content.rendered:
Emanuel is Law and Business Lecturer spanning a period of over 20 years at various Professional and Higher Education institutions in UK.

Courses Taught

Tutor for Business Law, Work and Employment Relations, International Human Resource Management, Learning and Development, Business in Practice, Academic Skills and Legal and Ethical Issues in Health and Social Care
